name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links
description: Take on Duelists around the world with "Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links"! Step into a world that crosses dimensions and connects all Duelists. In Duel World, any location transforms into a Duel Field where heated Duels unfold!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: On Board Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 monitor resolution
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-3320 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeFore GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: On Board Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 monitor resolution
